title: [其他]WildernessTp —— 随机传送，让你的脚步遍布整个地图！[1.12]
author: 小鱼123
txt_content:
本帖最后由 小鱼123 于 2018-2-6 22:17 编辑 

[** TRUE WILD TP] Teleports to random location with no sounds cost and cooldown along with GUI[一个真正的野外传送插件] 将玩家瞬间移动到任意位置，支持在GUI展示冷却简介
Wild插件修改了随机传送的规则，来为想要有一个随机传送体验的玩家们打造全新的野外传送!不同于Mojang原版的 "/tp" 指令或是其他插件, Wild插件提供有趣的、全新的传送体验，因为它拥有精英级的类(class)文件以及变量的命名方案.


一些传送类插件的特性:
Iz compatible wit [insert ur region claiming plogen(s) here]! Ur poor player will not be teleported to a place where he cannot destroy blocks!Why only teleport to just a random location, like every other boring wilderness TP plugin? Ever wanted to travel to a RANDOM WORLD too? Well with this plugin, the ONE TRUE WILDERNESSTP, yes, it is possible, and configurable!Avoids TPS drops due to chunk generation and loading! Benefits both pregenerated and non-pregenerated worlds!Actually tries to avoid lag while looking for a random, safe spot for your valuable player to land (instead of crashing the server while desperately loading 300 chunks all at once to find a safe spot.)No, you do not need to cripple NCP 2 b wild! B wild and cheat free!



告示牌格式1行: [wildtp]
2行:
3行: 世界名称 (可选)
4行:

配置及信息配置文件：[CODE=yaml]MaxXY: 5000MinXY: -5000Retries: 4Cooldown: 30Cost: 0Wait: 5dropPlayerFromAbove: falseSound: 'ENTITY_ENDERMEN_TELEPORT'BlockedBiomes:- 'DEEP_OCEAN'- 'OCEAN'- 'FROZEN_OCEAN'DoCommands: falsePostCommands:- 'title %PLAYER% times 20 100 20'- 'title %PLAYER% title ["",{"text":"Wilderness","color":"green","bold":false}]'- 'title %PLAYER% subtitle ["",{"text":"Its too dangerous to go alone.","color":"yellow"}]'# Should we use the randomWorlds list? If false, defaults to the world the player is currently in.useRandomWorlds: false# Regarding randomWorlds: the key is the world name, the value is its probability value.# Probability is calculated by adding up all the values (in this case, 1337 + 42 = 1379)# In this default case, world_nether has only a 42/1379 (3.05%) chance of being selected.# Feel free to add or remove worlds from this list.# If you aren't good at math: The higher the number, the higher the chance the world has of being selected at random.# You can also use this to restrict WildTP to one world: just leave only a single world in this list, and the player will only be teleported to that world.randomWorlds:world: 1337world_nether: 42



信息：[CODE=yaml]NO_PERMS: '&4你没有权限!'NO_SIGN_PERMS: '&4你没有创造一个WildTP的牌子的权限!'NO_BREAK: '&4嗨! 你不能破坏一个WildTP的牌子!'NO_LOCATION: '&4找不到合适的位置.'NO_BIOME: '&4你不能在 %BIOME% 放置告示牌'YES_SIGN: '&a成功创建了一个WildTP告示牌'BREAK_SIGN: '&a你破坏了一个WildTP告示牌'COOLDOWN: '&4你必须等待%TIME%秒后才能够使用这个指令/告示牌 'RELOADED: '&a插件配制文件重载成功.'

命令

/wild - 供玩家使用，让使用指令的玩家随机传送/wild [player] - 供管理员使用，让指定玩家随机传送/wild [world] - 随机传送到指定的世界/wild [north/south/east/west] 随机传送到指定的方向/wildtp reload - 重载插件配置/wildtp create - 使用WorldEdit插件来选择一个区域 (你只能使用 WorldEdit 来创建,在创建完成后可以删除它)/wildtp delete - 删除一个传送区/wildtp list - 列出所有传送点/wildtp - 展示帮助文本/wildtp gui

/wild - command for players to get randomly teleported
/wild [player] - Command for admins to teleport other players to random a location
/wild [world] - Random teleport to a specific world
/wild [north/south/east/west] Random teleport towards a specific direction
/wildtp reload - Reload the plugin config
/wildtp create - Creates a portal within the selected WorldEdit region (you only need WorldEdit to create portals, afterwards you can remove it)
/wildtp delete - Delete a portal
/wildtp list - Lists portals
/wildtp - shows help message
/wildtp gui



权限
wild.wildtp - Give player access to /wild
wild.wildtp.world - Give player access to /wild [world]
wild.wildtp.direction - Give player access to /wild [north/south/east/west]
wild.wildtp.others - Gives the player the ability to use /wild on other players
wild.wildtp.reload - Gives the player the ability to reload the plugin's config
wild.wildtp.create.sign - Gives the player ability to create WildTp signs
wild.wildtp.break.sign - Allows the player to break wildtp signs
wild.wildtp.set - opens the gui
wild.wildtp.create.portal - Allows creation, listing, and deletion of portals
